name: The Man Who Smoked A Joint And Stayed High Forever
name_original: The Man Who Smoked A Joint And Stayed High Forever
description:
this game follows the last moments of life of a self-loathing addict who just had a relapse.

Input: keyboard.

Note: for a different take on the same subject, see:
[de telefone na mão, não sabendo que teclas premir]
